Parameters: A status code indicating the result of the operation.
The achievement data that was requested. This is guaranteed to be non-null, though it may be empty. The listener must close this object when finished.
onAchievementsLoaded(int, com.google.and.Description: Called when achievement data has been loaded. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_OK_E@ if data was successfully loaded and is up-to-date. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_NETWORK_ERROR_NO_DATA_E@ if the device was unable to retrieve any data from the network and has no data cached locally. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_NETWORK_ERROR_STALE_DATA_E@ if the device was unable to retrieve the latest data from the network, but has some data cached locally. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_CLIENT_RECONNECT_REQUIRED_E@ if the @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient_E@ needs to reconnect to the service to access this data. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_LICENSE_CHECK_FAILED_E@ if the game is not licensed to the user. @B_com#google#android#gms#games#GamesClient#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
onAchievementsLoaded(int, com.google.and.FullName: public abstract void onAchievementsLoaded (int statusCode, AchievementBuffer buffer)

ClassDesc: Listener for receiving callbacks when achievement data has been loaded.
